BBK01.BU1118: Central government debt - total money market paper
General: From January 2009, including the debt of the Financial Market Stabilisation Fund (SoFFin). From March 2009, including the debt of the Investment and Repayment Fund.
Comment on 2009-01: From January 2009, including the debt of the Financial Market Stabilisation Fund (SoFFin).
Comment on 2009-03: From March 2009, including the debt of the Investment and Repayment Fund.
